Articles.Content: So... what about other modes?? I mean, I know there is already career mode ad sandbox mode, but is anybody else looking for a few more modes to play? One mode I thought of was a business mode. In this mode you would be a galactic transport company and you would have to transport people, cargo and even other ships to randomly generated space station, outposts and bases scattered around the kerbol galaxy. You would then receive money for these jobs to get bigger ships to do better jobs to get more money to get a bigger ship and so on. What do people think of this? What do people think about new modes? I would love to see everyones' thoughts and if you are feeling daring, maybe suggest a mode yourself. Lets make this a discussion. Lets talk about it.

Most other modes could and probably will be put into career mode. The mode you propose as an example could easily be implemented through contracts.

Something that extensive would be far in the future.

If it isn't in squads interest to develop the contracts that far, it would be up to the modding community to build off of the contract system. Regardless the Career mode would allow most other modes to be implemented, either through contracts and other updates.(need part costs primarily )
Your suggestion would be the best scenario ever! Defo need this as a more challenging scenario to get more advanced players playing them
For this to work though, part costs would definitely need to be put in to place... I can see what you're getting at their MKI. Thanks Ikaneko!!
Contracts are next on squads to do list, and Are basically going to be like this, so no need for a new playmode
